roleset.name: cause to become used up, tired
roleset.note: FATIGUE-V NOTES: Frames created by Arrick (from fatigue.01-v)
FATIGUED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from fatigued.01-j)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: The humiliation of * being unrecognized as a part of the international community, the repressiveness of martial law, and the frustrations of a fatiguing life had built up the emotions in Taiwanese society to a boiling point.

example.name: arg1
example.text: She has been quite fatigued over the last year and has been sleeping more .
